availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph M. Robb (Greenup County, Kentucky, clerk )

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Father of Anna Robb. Married to Lucinda Robb. Appointed postmaster in Clarksburgh, Lewis County, Kentucky on June 25, 1846. Clerk in East Little Sandy, Greenup County, Kentucky in 1860. Enrolled for military duty in ninth District of Kentucky in October 1863 (U.S.A). KYR-0001-004-2126.

ab.bibl: Eight Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, East Little Sandy, p. 914. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Greenupsburg, p. 39. Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, [14 & 664], (accessed via Ancestry.com). Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Greenup County, KY, May 1865, p. 128, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
